Text: Hi there - hey what's up with TorrentDay and IP Torrents, do you(or anyone) know? They and SceneTime are down - seems oddly coincidental given they all use th same template, and content is virtually identical - I always assumed they were a bunch of friends, so I guess maybe their common server is down?
Many thanks, another great episode from half of the chaps that brought us the legendary The League of Gentleman.
